titleStmt.title: Speculum matricis hybernicum, or, The Irish midwives handmaid catechistically composed by James Wolveridge, M.D. ; with a copious alphabetical index.
titleStmt.author: Wolveridge, James, d. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Okes, and are to be sold by Rowland Reynolds ...,
